programme.desc: Faulty Powers: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. Max thinks he's solved things, but creates brand new powers Chloe can't control. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Licence to Fly: Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but it's too much for Ray when he starts to act like a nervous parent. Charlotte, Jasper, and Piper find a cotton candy machine. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Swellview's Got Talent: After discovering contestants on Swellview's Got Talent are losing consciousness, Captain Man and Kid Danger find out what is causing the mischief. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Escape From Beneath Glove World: SpongeBob and Patrick are sent to jail in the underground tunnels of Glove World, leading to a daring escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Krusty Krab crew goes to a big concert to sell krabby patties in 'Krusty Koncessionaires', then in 'Dream Hoppers', SpongeBob explores the melodious dreamscapes of his sleeping neighbours.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Gossip Guy: The school newspaper has a sudden increase in sales when a gossip column appears poking fun at other students. (S4, ep 18b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave Rebooted: Dave gets temporary amnesia so the boys trick him into letting them skip school and go on a ski trip instead.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon Says: When Alvin accuses Simon of being too safe, Simon agrees to do whatever crazy thing Alvin wants him to do. (S4, ep 5a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dad Jokes: Alvin is alarmed that Dave will be hosting an auction where he'll have to tell jokes because he's not that funny. (S4, ep 19b)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy decide to turn their cabin into a pirate ship in 'Camp Crossbones', then in 'A Jelly Life', SpongeBob pretends to be a jellyfish for research purposes. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Squidward is determined for his cabin to win the annual camp art competition in 'Painting with Squidward', then in 'Kamp Kow', The Kamp Koral campers befriend a cow with a big appetite. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lana struggles to leave her pets behind for the weekend in 'Pet Project', and in 'Cuff Break', after Lincoln tests a magic trick on Grouse, they get handcuffed together. (S9, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni is put in charge of the school's prom in 'Prom-Com', then in 'Scene Steeler', Lincoln and Clyde cast Luan as the villain in their film and have to deal with her method acting. (S9, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick gets some luxury pampering in 'Patrick's Staycation', and then in 'Walking The Plankton', Plankton wonders who's looking after the Krabby Patty formula while Mr Krabs is on a cruise.

programme.title: Blurt
programme.desc: When a kid puts on a mysterious set of VR glasses, he has to say everything he thinks out loud, and finds that sometimes you have to speak up to make a difference. Starring Jace Norman and Jojo Siwa.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Prank War - Part 2: The Prank War rages on with Danger Force's best pranker now on team Rivalton. It's up to Captain Man and Danger Force to find a way to end this once and for all. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Vidja Games: Danger Force and Captain Man get hooked making celebrity videos to start raking in cash. But then they accidentally send out a video that reveals their secret identities! (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Faulty Powers: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. Max thinks he's solved things, but creates brand new powers Chloe can't control. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Bummer School: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. They realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Thumb Buddies Back: The Thumb Buddies return from space and are intent on getting revenge against Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Up The Stairs!: Henry and Ray's friendship is put to the test when they must make the half mile trek up the stairs to make a surprise meal by a celebrity chef in Junk-N-Stuff. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Bad Roommate: Andre stays with Tori to work on a song for class. They find they aren't the best roommates. Jade discovers an unflattering picture of herself on the internet. (S3, ep 22)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victori-Yes: Mr. Sikowitz challenges the students to say yes to everything for one week. The gang agrees, and they soon find themselves out of their respective comfort zones. (S3, ep 23)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Brain Squeezers: Tori is picked to go on a game show, and must choose three teammates. Everyone wants to be on it - but when they get there, it's not all fun and games! (S3, ep 24)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: The Brit Brats: Sam and Cat babysit two girls who fool them both. Sam goes to Elderly Acres in an attempt to fulfill a community service requirement for her online high school. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Babysitter War: When a client says "You're my favourite babysitter ever", Sam and Cat aren't sure which one of them he meant. So they each compete to see who really is the best. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mad Max - Beyond Thunderhome: Max finally declares his independence from his parents' house rules and moves to his friend's house, where they only rule is that there are no rules! (S4, ep 28)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thundreth: Nearing their 100th save, Phoebe & Max are determined to make it their best one yet. But they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on his old rivals - Hank and Barb. (S4, ep 29)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Shapeshiftian Candidate: Clawdeen organizes a Get Out the Vote concert, and along with Romulus must rush to escape a troll. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The enemies of the Star family team up to exact their revenge in 'Best Served Cold', then in 'Tattoo Hullabaloo', Bunny's sailor tattoo finds himself in trouble. (S2, ep 9)

programme.desc: The Future King of Duels: Luke challenges Yuga to a Rush Duel to prove that he's the future King of Duels! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Knit Wit: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: knitting. But after using it to save his classmates, he proudly admits it. (S3 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Fuss on the Bus: Having never booked the field trip he promised the kids, Chef has to manufacture a full day of delays on the bus trip to avoid getting to Happy Sunshine Good Time Land. (S3 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Cone-versation: Noah is forced to wear a cone of shame and feels left out of everything. But when he learns of pirate treasure buried under the school, he becomes leader of the quest. (S3 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rock the Rush Duel: Romin loves to play guitar, but duelling doesn't strike her chord. Can Yuga convince Romin that Rush Duel rocks? (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: How Dare You Hit My Bulma! Vegeta's Furious Mutation?!: When Buu can't land a hit on Beerus, Trunks and Goten fuse into Gotenks and the other fighters charge into the fray. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Abaracaduncan: When a magic trick goes sideways, Duncan makes a great escape and Harold becomes the target of a Sorcerer Hunt! (S2 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Shock & Aww: When Courtney gets the old, gross daycare carpet replaced with a new one, the resulting static electricity has unexpected consequences. (S2 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Whack Mirror: Chef warns Beth and Cody that making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Annedroids
programme.desc: Out of Hand: When Hand acts out of control, Anne, Nick and Shania think she's throwing temper tantrums or that she's been infected by a computer virus. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth Gwrtaith yn cynnal te prynhawn. Ond mae pethau'n mynd yn anniben iawn pan bod gyrr o wartheg yn ymyrryd. An afternoon tea turns into chaos when a herd of cows turn up. [SL]

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd: awn ar wyliau byr yng Nghymru. Dau griw, dwy gyllideb wahanol: sut hwyl gawn nhw? New series. Two crews, two different budgets: who will have the most fun? First up: Brecon. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y cyflwynydd Lara Catrin a'r trefnydd proffesiynol Gwenan Rosser sy'n rhoi trefn ar gypyrddau dillad a llofftydd Cymru. This week: decluttering Llio Thomas's wardrobe in Pen Llyn. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Sir 5 ar y daith yw Sir Gr, Sir Gaerfyrddin. Awn i Gaerfyrddin, Llanelli, Talacharn, Llansteffan, Mynydd Du, Drefach a Llandysul. We end our journey in Carmarthenshire and Ceredigion. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Dysga Alun sut mae'r sychder diweddara yn effeithio ar fferm yn y canolbarth, a Meinir sy'n clywed hanes beiciwr rhyngwladol. As the FUW celebrates its 70th, Nia visits its former president. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Scott Quinnell sy'n teithio Cymru yn troi ei law at bob math o weithgareddau a phrofiadau amrywiol. New series with Scott Quinnell. In this episode, he fishes, skates and beatboxes! [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Down ni i nabod y ddynes tu l i'r tannau, Elinor Bennett - gwleidydd, cyfreithwraig, gwraig a mam annwyl. This time we chat to harpist, Elinor Bennett - politician, lawyer, wife and mother. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Dim Lle
programme.desc: Ffocws ar y broblem o le, wrth i ysbytai'r gogledd droi at drin cleifion yng nghefn ambiwlansys. A look at the problems arising from the lack of space at Ysbyty Gwynedd and Maelor, Wrexham. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Tro hwn, aiff Eifion, Alys, Meriel a Gareth ni ar deithiau i Lyn y Fan Fach, Llangrannog, Cei Newydd, a Moel Eilio. We take trips to Llyn y Fan Fach, Llangrannog, New Quay and Snowdonia. [SL]

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn ystod oes pan mae bywyd gwyllt o dan fygythiad difrifol, edrycha Iolo ar gyflwr natur Cymru. During an age in which wildlife is under threat, Iolo looks at the state of Wales' nature. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Sioned yn dangos sut i luosogi planhigion efo torriadau gwaelodol, ac Adam yn trwsblannu yn yr ardd lysiau. In Pant y Wennol, Meinir creates a large planter out of an old filing cabinet. [SL]

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, gyda llu o arbenigwyr wrth gefn. Cawn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gael gi - pa fath fydd yn eu siwtio? We help 4 families find their perfect dog.

programme.title: Llwyfan y Maes: Candelas
programme.desc: Rhan o gyngherddau Eisteddfod Genedlaethol Cymru 2023 o Lwyfan y Maes - cyfle i fwynhau cerddoriaeth gan y Candelas. A chance to enjoy the Candelas set from the National Eisteddfod 2023.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae chwech o gynhyrchwyr ac entrepreneuriaid bwyd yn cystadlu am 5K a chynllun mentora unigryw. New series. Six food entrepreneurs compete for the 5K and a mentoring scheme.

programme.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Cyfres gydag Ifan Jones Evans yn cymryd golwg ar archif un o gyfresi mwyaf eiconig S4C. Join Ifan Jones Evans as he dips into the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

programme.title: Tafwyl '24: Uchafbwyntiau Sul
programme.desc: Mae Huw Stephens, Tara Bethan a Lloyd Lewis ym Mharc Bute yn un o ddigwyddiadau mwyaf cyffrous Cymru. Tafwyl coverage, with musical performances in the hidden garden, and a set by Gwilym.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Trip i'r brifddinas sy'n galw'r tro ma wrth i Beti a Huw aros yn Parador 44, gwesty a redir gan deulu'r Owens. This time: a trip to family hotel, Parador 44.and a pop-in to Clwb Ifor Bach.

programme.title: Yn y Lwp
programme.desc: Molly Palmer sy'n cyflwyno Buddug, Lleucu Non, Dydd Miwsig Cymru Dathlu 10 & Ceiri Humphreys Pys Melyn. Items from Buddug, Lleucu Non, Welsh Language Music Day & Ceiri Humphreys (Pys Melyn).

programme.title: Ar Led
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd gyda Miriam Isaac a Carwyn Blayneysy'n archwilio pob agwedd o iechyd rhywiol ac addysg rhyw. New series exploring every aspect of sexual health and sex education.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du a Gwyn yn paentio dinas gyda help eu ffrind newydd, Llwyd. Black and White colour a city with the help of new friend, Grey.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl cath fach a Delor a'i asynnod. Today we meet some cute kittens and Delor and her donkeys.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Daw galwad gan Gareth Potter y DJ a Lloyd - o na! mae eu seinyddion wedi torri. A call comes in from DJ Gareth Potter and Lloyd. Harri's help is needed as Gareth's speakers are broken.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno Chlwb Achub Bywyd Llanilltud Fawr; cwrddwn Hollie a Heidi a'u ffrindiau pigog; a bydd Meleri a Ieuan yn chwilio am pob math o adar yn Llanelli. Fresh air fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Sin persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble ddaw hadau blodau haul. Mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd nhw i Fferm Fach am dro. Nel and Guto want to know where Sunflower seeds come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Mr a Mrs Twrch yn mynd ar eu gwyliau, ac mae Twm Twrch yn gwahodd Mishmosh draw i aros. Mr and Mrs Twrch are going on holiday for the weekend, and Twm Twrch invites Mishmosh to stay.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Yn y ffair mae Joni'n awyddus i chwarae'r gemau fel y myn, tra ceisia Jason ddysgu gwerth strategaeth iddo. Joni is keen to play the fair games as he wants, while Jason values strategy.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac y tro hwn byddwn yn dod i nabod crwban y mor a gloyn y llaethlys. This time, we get to know the sea turtle and the milkweed butterfly.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn direidus heddiw? What's happening in the mischievous pups' lives today?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Dderwen sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Dderwen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Nl i'r Gwersyll
programme.desc: Mae'r criw'n aros ym mloc Penhelyg am benwythnos 80au. Pa weithgaredd fydd wedi'i drefnu i'r gwersyllwyr? It's 80s weekend! Which house is most competitive and what 80s food will they eat?

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn rhannu tips am gadw'r ardd lysiau yn gynhyrchiol, ac mae Meinir efo Stifyn Parri yn ei ardd yn San Ffagan. Rhys Rowlands challenges our view of how to use rhubarb in the kitchen.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: MaeHeledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn dod i adnabod ardal Rhosllanerchrugog - cymuned gyda llawer o hanes, diwylliant a diwydiant ar ffin Cymru - Lloegr. We discover more about Rhosllanerchrugog.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau: Ymweliad menter i gefnogi'r digartref yng Nghaerdydd, stori llenor ac ymgyrchydd dros hawliau LHDTC+, a mwy. Rhodri Gomer presents series highlights in the final programme.

programme.title: New: Ralio: Cymal Cyffro Sardinia
programme.desc: Cymal cyffro chweched rownd Pencampwriaeth Rali'r Byd o ynys Sardinia. Live Power Stage action from Rally Italia Sardegna, the sixth round of the World Rally Championship from Sardinia.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae Bingo'r ci wedi gweithio i'r fyddin yn rhai o wledydd mwyaf peryglus y byd, gan gynnwys Afghanistan - ond beth sydd ganddo yn ei stumog? A brave forces dog is treated for stomach pains.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Awn i un o syrcasau cyfoes mwyaf Ewrop gyda Trystan Chambers, a chawn gip ar waith yr argraffwr Elin Crowley. We're at the Celtic Deaf Festival and see glass-work at Swansea School of Art.

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn deithiau i Nant Gwrtheyrn, Rhoscolyn, Blaengarw a Ceunant Clydach, gyda Zoe, Islwyn, Jordan a Helen. Four walks, four competitors but only one winner. It's time to go Am Dro!

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Cyprus
programme.desc: Beti George sydd yn mynd ni ar daith i gwrdd rhai o drigolion Cyprus - y Groegwyr yn y de a'r Twrciaid yn y gogledd. Beti George takes us to Cyprus to meet Greeks and Turks living there.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n edrych ar sut mae pobl wedi manteisio ar ein hadnodd naturiol mwyaf toreithiog - dwr. Dewi Prysor looks at how we use one of our most abundant natural resources - water.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Dysga Alun sut mae'r sychder diweddara yn effeithio ar fferm yn y canolbarth, a Meinir sy'n clywed hanes beiciwr rhyngwladol. As the FUW celebrates its 70th, Nia visits its former president.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Hafiach
programme.desc: Wrth i arholiadau criw o ddisgyblion orffen mae'n amser dathlu, ond ceir darganfyddiad erchyll cyn pen dim. Themau aeddfed. A horrible discovery befalls some GCSE revellers. Adult themes.

programme.title: Joe Allen: Y Chwiban Olaf
programme.desc: Rhaglen yn dilyn Joe Allen wrth iddo wynebu penderfyniad caletaf ei yrfa - dal ati i chwarae neu cerdded i ffwrdd. Documentary following Joe Allen through a season like no other.

programme.title: Radio Fa'ma
programme.desc: Pobol Dyffryn Aman sy'n rhannu eu straeon tro 'ma wrth i Tara a Kris yrru carafan 'Radio Fa'ma' i Waun-Cae-Gurwen. The people of the Amman Valley share their stories with the duo this time.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Dylan Iorwerth sy'n dilyn taith Y Gohebydd, John Griffith, radical a chyfathrebwr pwysig yn ei oes. The journey of radical and communicator John Griffith - from Wales to London and America.

programme.title: Bois y Rhondda
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, mae'r bois yn mynd i gampio - gydag ambell un yn ymdopi'n well na'r lleill. In this episode, the boys go camping - but how will they cope sleeping under the stars?

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. 1988. Drama. Stars Michael Caine, Armand Assante & Ray McAnally. Chief Inspector Frederick Abberline is assigned to investigate the murder of a prostitute in the East End of London. [S]

programme.title: Jack The Ripper
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. 1988. Drama. Stars Michael Caine, Armand Assante & Ray McAnally. The killer is nicknamed 'Jack the Ripper' after a letter is forwarded to Scotland Yard. [S]

programme.title: Ruth Ellis and the Mystery Lover
programme.desc: 1977. Captivating documentary about Ruth Ellis, the last woman to be hanged in Britain. Featuring the only interview with Desmond Cussen, who reflects on his life with Ruth, and her death.

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Struggle for a Planet. 1964. Narrator: Sir Michael Redgrave. In 1943, occupied Europe is ruled by Nazi puppets. The German's batter against Russia, the British and Americans battle the Japanese. [S]

programme.title: Sing As You Swing
programme.desc: 1937. Musical. Directed by Redd Davis. Starring Evelyn Dall, Claude Dampier & Lu Ann Meredith. Top British radio stars perform in this musical revue. [S]

programme.title: BFI: A Message From Mars
programme.desc: 1913. Sci-Fi. Director: J. Wallett Waller. The first silent British sci-fi feature (with new score). A Martian visits earth to cure a selfish man (similar to 'A Christmas Carol') on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Walking Lake of Jupiter. 1963. Stars Libby Morris & Murray Kash. Scientists on Jupiter learn that water from a lake on the planet has the power to cause inanimate objects to move. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Deep Freeze. 1966. Stars Adam West, Otto Preminger & Kem Dibbs. As public animosity mounts, Batman and Robin hang up their capes. Meanwhile, Mr. Freeze decides to blackmail Gotham City. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Strange Monks of Latroun. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Alister Williamson & Olaf Pooley. Richard investigates a murder and robbery committed by the so-called monks of the Latroun Monastery. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Keep It Cool. 1961. Stars Graydon Gould & David Graham. Dr Beaker is escorting a dangerous load of explosives when Masterspy sets a trap that forces the truck to become lost then disabled. [S]

programme.title: Seventy Deadly Pills
programme.desc: 1964. Family. Director: Pat Jackson. Stars: Gareth Robinson, Len Jones & Sally Thomsett. A gang of children, 'The Rockets' have their clubhouse used by a pair of villains on the run. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Edge and the Point. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Michael Gough & John Arnatt. After defeating Will Scarlet and then Robin Hood in combat, a crusader offers his services to the Deputy Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: The Giant Claw
programme.desc: 1957. Sci-fi. Directed by Fred F. Sears. Stars Jeff Morrow, Mara Corday & Morris Ankrum. A giant extraterrestrial bird arrives on Earth and leaves a trail of death and destruction in its wake. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Aerialist. 1959. Starring: John Newland, Mike Connors & Yvette Vickers. An argument between trapeze artists results in an accident in which one is paralysed, and the other is torn by guilt. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Julian Bond. Mr Parkes (Terence Seward), a playboy, & Mrs Aston (Marsha Fitzalan), wife of a Whitehall official, are threatened by the Drew Brothers (Ernie Drew by Bernard Kay).

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Flight 104. 1968. Stars Francis Matthews & David Healy. When the Mysterons threaten to sabotage a conference in Switzerland, Scarlet and Blue are assigned to escort the world's leading astrophysicist.

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1958. Crime of Honour. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Starring Russell Napier, Ivan Craig and Jean Lodge. A Thames Estuary dredger drags a man's body from the bed of the river. (S1, E28)

programme.title: Lord Jim
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Directed by Richard Brooks. Stars James Mason, Peter O'Toole & Curt Jurgens. A discredited seaman, desperately seeking to redeem himself, agrees to deliver a dangerous shipment. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: General Stories 2. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Billy Dainty, Clive Dunn, Liza Goddard, Yootha Joyce, Bernard Manning, Jack Parnell & Mike Reid. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Prey. 1978. Stars Tommy Boyle & Deidre Costello. Maureen always complained to the police - so much that they stopped listening. The pity is, if they hadn't, she might still be alive today. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. A Lesson In War. Created by John Finch. Stars Keith Drinkel & David Swift. Philip and a Polish comrade capture a German soldier in the Western Desert. (S2, E03) [S]

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: 1968. Thriller. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Mia Farrow, Laurence Harvey, Tom Courtenay. British Intelligence orders its operatives to eliminate a Soviet spy, unaware he's one of their own men. [S]

programme.title: Run for the Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Thriller. Directed by Roy Boulting. Stars Jane Greer, Richard Widmark & Trevor Howard. An author and a journalist find themselves at the mercy of wanted war criminals in the Mexican jungle. [S]

programme.title: Run for the Sun
programme.desc: 1956. Thriller. Directed by Roy Boulting. Stars Jane Greer, Richard Widmark & Trevor Howard. An author and a journalist find themselves at the mercy of wanted war criminals in the Mexican jungle. [S]

programme.title: King Kong 2
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Director: John Guillermin. Stars Brian Kerwin, Linda Hamilton & Peter Elliott. Years after his fall from a skyscraper, King Kong is in a coma and in dire need of a blood transfusion. [S]

programme.title: Allan Quatermain & The Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director Gary Nelson. Stars Richard Chamberlain, Sharon Stone & James Earl Jones. Quatermain sets out to find his missing brother and the Lost City of Gold. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Saturday Special
programme.desc: 1969. An enchanting glimpse of the work of the Children's Film Foundation.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Wheels/Grayling Fishing. 1981. Jack Hargreaves takes his strawberry cart to Mr. White the wheelwright for repairs. He then goes to the river Kennet for a spot of fishing for grayling. [S]

programme.title: Climb Up the Wall
programme.desc: 1960. Musical & Variety. Directed by Michael Winner. Featuring performers such as George 'Calypso' Browne, Russ Conway and Frances Day. [S]

programme.title: Fire Maidens From Outerspace
programme.desc: 1956. Sci-Fi comedy. Spacemen land on the 13th Moon of Jupiter and find man-hungry space girls waiting for them. Stars: Harry Fowler, Paul Carpenter & Sydney Tafler. [S]

programme.title: Jack the Giant Killer
programme.desc: 1962. Fantasy. Directed by Nathan Juran. Stars Kerwin Mathews, Judi Meredith, & Torin Thatcher. The treacherous Pendragon plots to gain the throne of Cornwall. Can anyone stop the evil sorcerer? [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed's Dilemma. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Bea Benaderet. Granny and Cousin Pearl fight over who's going to take care of the cooking and the house, leading Jed to step in. [S]

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: 1953. Western. Director: Ray Nazarro. Stars Sterling Hayden, Eve Miller, Barton MacLane. An army engineer is sent to oversee the construction of the Kansas Pacific railroad and stop any saboteurs. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Policeman's Lot
programme.desc: 1960. A look at a typical day in a policeman's life, which uncovers more than expected from the role.

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: A Little Learning. 1979. Stars Jon Pertwee, Charlotte Coleman & Jeremy Austin. Worzel turns the farm upside down in a search for his misplaced turnip head which makes him very clever. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Deep Freeze. 1966. Stars Adam West, Otto Preminger & Kem Dibbs. As public animosity mounts, Batman and Robin hang up their capes. Meanwhile, Mr. Freeze decides to blackmail Gotham City. [S]

programme.title: The Golden Hawk
programme.desc: 1952. Adventure. Directed by Sidney Salkow. Stars Rhonda Fleming, Sterling Hayden & Helena Carter. 17th-century French privateer Kit 'The Hawk' Gerardo sails the Caribbean in search of gold. [S]

programme.title: 1950s Puzzle Corner
programme.desc: Charming question time set around a 1950s. Incredible shots of London Airport, Coventry, The Coast with puzzles to solve - How many grooves on a 12 inch LP? When will the B.O.A.C plane reach New York?

programme.desc: Care to Dance: Bubble bubbles up a spin suit so that an injured Tutu can enjoy dancing again - but soon her spinning starts to wreak havoc on the hotel. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: Wishing Heart Hollow: With the help of some new friends, True must rescue the King Rainbow who gets trapped in the Wishing Heart Hollow cave. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Esme and Roy
programme.desc: The Swoozle News: Esme and Roy are watching Simon while Grammy works from home. But Simon wants to tell Grammy everything exciting thing that happens to him. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations
programme.desc: Watch What You Wish For/Down At The Library/Friend Ships/Get Up and Move Your Body/Love The Smell of: Jeremy learns a wish can have consequences and to think carefully before making one. (S1 Ep107)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Teeny Weeny to the Rescue: Night Ninja kidnaps An Yu and takes overs mystery mountain. Teeny tries to save the day, but his anger keeps getting in the way. (S5 Ep11)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Invisible Munki-Gu: Someone's causing mischief in the city. The PJMs blame the villains; the villains blame each other - but it's actually Munki-Gu, who's stolen an invisibility ring. (S5 Ep12)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Orticia Blooms: When an experiment goes wrong, Romeo tries to turn it to his advantage. (S5 Ep13)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Orticia and the Pumpkins: When Orticia send Gekko's Pumpkins bad, Gekko is desperate to stop them. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: A New Best-T: When Giganto doesn't seem interested in playing with Rocky, he finds a new "Big Guy" to play with. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Mini Giganto: The friends are doing a spring cleaning and offering their gently used stuff to others - except Rocky, who doesn't want to part with anything. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Good-Luck Maker: Some days, things just don't go right. The kind of day that gets off on the wrong foot! Before, every fifth day was like this for Ricky. But everything is about to change! (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: News of the Day: A journalist has announced that the person who makes the most interesting report about the life of the city will appear on TV. Ricky goes searching for local news. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Dreaming about Space: Grandpa Saur has always dreamed of some extraordinary adventure! For many years, grandfather has been looking in a telescope in the hope of spotting an alien. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: 20,000 Scraps Under The Sea: Molang and Piu Piu are on their small boat when they see a wrecked ship from afar. The captain swears a monster attacked him! (S5 Ep31)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Fallen From The Sky: A cute little creature lands in Molang and Piu Piu's garden. Our friends take care of it, but it starts to take up a lot of space... (S5 Ep32)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Musketeer's Glasses: Molang and Piu Piu help a musketeer on a dangerous mission. But when he loses his glasses, it's up to Molang and Piu Piu to protect him... (S5 Ep33)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Buckingham: After longing for the uniforms of the royal guard of Buckingham Palace, Molang and Piu Piu decide to fill out an application. (S5 Ep34)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Too Much: Merlin helps all those who need assistance with a twist of his magic wand. Molang and Piu Piu help him understand that the friends find satisfaction in doing things by themselves. (S5 Ep35)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Little Grey Cloud: Ollie has been swept away by a little grey cloud and has left his magic pencil behind. Mustard uses the pencil to find him. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Mustard's Little Brother: Mustard is annoyed because he has to take care of his little brother, Braylon, who drives everyone crazy. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Pamela lost a tooth, but the Tooth Fairy didn't visit her. The MiniWhats are outraged, so they set off in pursuit of the evil Tooth Fairy. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: At The Foot Of The Rainbow: Petula and Pamela set off on a magic pony in search of the treasure buried at the foot of the rainbow. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Little Yellow Riding Hood: Petula hasn't written her story for school, and it's due tomorrow. Ollie draws an old storybook and out pops Little Yellow Riding Hood, also known as Micheline. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Lost Dinosaur: When Min spots a rare dinosaur in a hidden forest, she's over the moon. When the Dino Ranchers and Tinhorns go to look for it, they realise it's important to respect nature. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Groupie Girl
programme.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.
